channel.title: Please help

item.title: Please help
item.dc:creator: @shlomi84 shlomi84
item.description:
@shlomi84 wrote:

so i wanna make a dialogue pop up when i click “teleport home” with 2 buttons i tried doing this:

in dialogue handler :

case 250:
sendOption2("#1", “#2”);
c.dialogueAction = 100;
c.dialogueId = 92;
break;

then i put this in clickingButtons :

case 117048:
case 4171:
case 50056:
c.getDH().sendDialogues(250, 1);
break;

i also tried, c.getDH().sendOption2("#1", “#2”);

Read full topic
